headline: A Look At Seagate Technology (STX) Valuation As AI Data Center And HAMR Demand Builds
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings (STX) is back in focus as investors react to its AI centered data center story, including the rollout of HAMR drives that lift capacity and support large scale cloud storage needs. See our latest analysis for Seagate Technology Holdings. The latest AI driven data center narrative comes on top of strong price momentum, with a 90 day share price return of 47.28% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 275.93%. This suggests sentiment has shifted sharply as investors...

headline: Why is there a RAM shortage? AI demand and the mad scramble for memory chips could hit where it hurts

headline: Seagate: HAMR Drives To Boost Capacity Of The Growth Story

headline: Heard on the Street Tuesday Recap: Sandisk Flies Higher
summary: Sandisk soared 28% and is now up almost 900% since its spinoff from Western Digital in February.  Western Digital gained 17% and Seagate rose 14%.  Huang discussed a new memory-storage platform for Nvidia's latest artificial-intelligence server system, into which it has integrated a host of connectivity and memory-storage products.
